Acceptance_Criteria: No failure at 1.5x limit load (2.5g maneuver gust)
2x Design Service Objective (DSO) without widespread fatigue damage
Flutter free up to 1.2 Vd/Md demonstrate control surface reversal margin > 15%
No catastrophic failure of primary spar damage contained per CS 25.571(e)(1)
Maximum leak rate < 0.1 oz/hr at operational pressure
No structural damage LSP continuity maintained < 2.5 milliohms
Skin buckling above limit load no failure at ultimate load
Hinge moment within Â±10% of predicted values across full deflection range
No delamination growth beyond 2x initial size after DSO cycles
Minimum pull-through strength 1.5x ultimate load per fastener
